Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Singapore's premier gourmet festival, Savour, is returning on May 12th to 15th at Bayfront Avenue. Look forward to a stellar line-up of decadent restaurants, live entertainment, and a tantalising gastronomic experience – featuring Martell Cordon Bleu, the cognac for true connoisseurs.
Cognac lovers should not miss our special food pairing tour. Get a Martell Passport and receive a taste of Martell to accompany you as you weave your way through the food kiosks. Our ambassadors will steer you to find the best pairings and help you discover the tasting notes that Cordon Bleu brings out.
Cheers,
MARTELL
Marina Bay Sands
10 Bayfront Avenue
Singapore 018956
Sign up for our Martell Gourmet Passport experience and get a chance to win free Savour vouchers worth $98.
